column4: does anyone know how to trace what is happening on desktop startup? the reason i ask is that i've got tracker and tracker-miner-fs in /etc/xdg/autostart but they don't start on login, wondering if there is a log somewhere
nothing there that i can see.
ah found something. tracker was set to OnlyShowIn GNOME;KDE;XFCE; - so that's why it wasn't starting. still wish i understood the XDG stuff better.
